mapper.select: SELECT * FROM invoice_head WHERE account_id = #{accountId} AND is_default = true LIMIT 1

SELECT h.*, a.nickname as accountName FROM invoice_head h left join account a on h.account_id = a.id
AND a.nickname like '%${invoiceHead.accountName}%'
AND h.tax_number like '%${invoiceHead.taxNumber}%'
and h.is_deleted = '0'
limit #{pageNum}, #{pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM invoice_head h left join account a on h.account_id = a.id
AND a.nickname like '%${invoiceHead.accountName}%'
AND h.tax_number like '%${invoiceHead.taxNumber}%'
